game.name: Peg Solitaire
game.rules: Peg solitaire is played with N pegs on a board containing N+1 holes. The puzzle starts with all holes except one filled with pegs.[br]To move, jump one peg over an adjacent peg to an empty hole immediately beyond the adjacent peg. When a peg is jumped over, it is removed from the board.[br]The goal is to remove all but one peg from the board.
